be-page4-future

be-page4-future

  • Connect to database
  • Stop connection 
library(diades.atlas)
# renv::install("dm")
# library(dm)
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)
library(ggplot2)

Connect to database

Do not forget to set environment variables in .Renviron 

# Connect to database
con <- connect()

# Listtables
# DBI::dbListTables(con)
# DBI::dbListObjects(con)

Stop connection 

DBI::dbDisconnect(con)
